name: Snake Attack 3D
description:
Just when you thought it was safe for a walk in the forest, or a swim on the beach, or a drive in the desert, from the darkness rises a giant renegade Snake. The more points the snake scores, the larger he will grow. You control this beast as he terrorizes the waters, attack cars, eats people, hunts down some scorpions and spiders. If you enjoy playing free play simulator type games, you will enjoy taking control of this huge 3D Snake.
Features Include:
--Snake hunting day and night
--4 Massive Maps to explore
--Desert maps, City and Farm Settings
--Excellent sound effects
--High Quality 3D graphics and exciting gameplay.

Try to complete the objectives before time runs out. This snake especially enjoys the taste of humans. Go hunting for people, spiders, horses, cars, and scorpions and come back with a full stomach. If you enjoy games like Goat Simulator, Shark Attack, Bear Simulator, Dinosaur Sim and Horse Simulator - you are going to love this 3D Snake Attack Simulator game. It is created with high quality graphics and smooth controls. It all takes place in a fun 3D environment. The must have game of the winter vacation season.
